# <a name="how-to-attach-files-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="aadc6-102">Kako da priložite datoteke u programu Outlook na Webu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="aadc6-102">How to attach files in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="aadc6-103">Na dnu poruke ili kalendar događaja, izaberite ikonu spajalice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="aadc6-103">At the bottom of a message or calendar event, select the paperclip icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="aadc6-104">.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="aadc6-104"></span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="aadc6-105">Izaberite **Potraži ovaj kompjuter** da priložite datoteku na računaru ili **Potraži oblak lokacije** da biste priložili datoteku na mreži.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="aadc6-105">Select **Browse this computer** to attach a file on your computer or **Browse cloud locations** to attach an online file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="aadc6-106">Da biste saznali više, pogledajte [Prilaganje datoteka u programu Outlook na Webu](https://support.office.com/article/48b8dca1-7a76-43ce-97d1-e1cf73893f55).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="aadc6-106">To learn more, see [Attach files in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/48b8dca1-7a76-43ce-97d1-e1cf73893f55).</span></span>
